    • Method Detail

      • connectToDB

        public void connectToDB()
        Imports the encrypted password from the database that is then passed to reverseString method to decrypt. Then connects to the database using the password.

      • checkDbForProductionRecordName

        public boolean checkDbForProductionRecordName(ProductionRecord productionRecord)
        Checks the Production Record table of the database for a Production Record matching the record passed in.
        Parameters:
        productionRecord - The Production Record object to be compared to the database.
        Returns:
        returns true if a matching record is found, false if a match is not found.

      • insertProductIntoDB

        public void insertProductIntoDB(java.lang.String[] insertValues)
                         throws java.sql.SQLException
        Inserts a new Product into the Product table using a Prepared statement.
        Parameters:
        insertValues - the values to be inserted.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - database error.

      • selectProductIdFromDb

        public int selectProductIdFromDb(Product product)
        Searches the database Product table for a product with a matching Id to the passed in Product.
        Parameters:
        product - The product to compare to the database.
        Returns:
        returns the id of the matching product. Returns 0 if no matching product is found.

      • loadProductList

        public javafx.collections.ObservableList loadProductList()
                                                  throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reads each row from the Product Table importing each of them and creating the appropriate Product.
        Returns:
        An ObservaleList of Products to be displayed by the GUI.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - database error.

      • loadProductionRecordList

        public java.util.ArrayList loadProductionRecordList(javafx.collections.ObservableList<Product> observableList)
                                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Reads each Record in the Production Record table then imports them creating Production Record objects for the GUI to display.
        Parameters:
        observableList - The list of Products the GUI has to be used to associate a Product Object with each Production Record.
        Returns:
        ArrayList of Production Records to be used by the GUI.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - database error.

      • addToProductionDbMethod

        public void addToProductionDbMethod(java.lang.String[] insertValues)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        A method utilizing Prepared Statements to insert Production Records into the SQL database.
        Parameters:
        insertValues - The String[] values to be used for the P.S.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - database error.

      • disconnectFromDB

        public void disconnectFromDB()
        Called after every database interaction is concluded to close connection to the database.

      • reverseString

        public java.lang.String reverseString(java.lang.String string)
        This method is used to decrypt the databse password that is pulled from the properties file.
        Parameters:
        string - Password to be decoded.
        Returns:
        String decoded database password.

      • getAudioCount

        public int getAudioCount()
        Used for the exporting of serial numbers of AudioPlayers to ensure their uniqueness.
        Returns:
        int, Audio Count used for Serial Numbers.

      • getVisualCount

        public int getVisualCount()
        Used for the exporting of serial numbers of MoviePlayers to ensure their uniqueness.
        Returns:
        int, Audio Count used for Serial Numbers.
